description:
A basic front attack with a push at the end.
Also intrupts target if casting.
name: Attack

description: Shoots an arrow that pierces through enemies.
name: Ranged Attack
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
through: 2
cooldown: 30
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
user pose atk
wait 1
picture projectile%[12-6] true 6
move forward 480 30
wait 1
</absSequence>

name: Dodge
note:
Doesn't do much, just moves the user
72 pixels forward at an increased speed

<absSettings>
cooldown: 180
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
trigger
user speed inc
user move forward 72 true
user speed dec
</absSequence>

description:
Shoots an arrow with a trail. Stops when it hits
an event or tile
name: Ranged Attack With Trail
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
through: 3
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
user pose atk
user jump backward 48
wait 15
picture sentryShotSmall%[4-5] true 4
trail trail true 4
move forward 480 30
wait 30
</absSequence>

description:
Shoots an arrow with a trail. Stops when it hits
an event or tile. Move to arrow position at end.
name: Ranged Attack With Trail 2
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
through: 3
overwater: true
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
user pose atk
user jump backward 48
wait 15
picture sentryShotSmall%[4-5] true 4
trail trail true 4
move forward 480 30
wait 30
user speed inc 2
user jumphere true
user speed dec 2
</absSequence>
